content_blocks.content:
Executive Summary
-----------------
Revenue increased 23.7% YoY to $847.3M, driven by enterprise segment growth and geographic expansion into APAC markets. EBITDA margin improved to 31.2% (+4.3pp) due to operational efficiency gains.
